item.description: Cruise to the Isles of Shoals on the Victorian style steamship, The Thomas Laighton. The boat leaves from Portsmouth NH for a 3 hr. narrated(historical and informational) trip. There are 3 decks, food(or you can bring your own picnic lunch) and chairs(indoors and outdoors). The cost is $26 for adults and $23 for those 65 and older. Please email me at kimen@msn.com or call me at 603-432-4271 or 603-505-6172 if you would like to go. We can carpool from the Manchester/Nashua area as well as other areas of NH, ME and MA.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Steamship Cruise to Isles of Shoals
